ingredients_raw: {2 c. cubed red potatoes,2 Tbsp. finely chopped purple onion,1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. white wine vinegar,1 Tbsp. freeze-dried chives,1 tsp. olive oil,1/4 tsp. sugar,1/4 tsp. salt,1/4 tsp. pepper}

{12 oz. pkg. rotini,6 oz. pkg. Good Seasons Zesty Italian salad mix,16 oz. Kraft Zesty Italian dressing,"2 cucumbers, diced","2 tomatoes, diced","1 bell pepper, diced","1 medium size purple onion, diced","black olives, optional"}
{1 1/2 lb. yams,1 egg,1 chopped onion,1 chopped tomato,"1 small green chile, minced",1/2 c. bread crumbs,peanut oil,pinch of cayenne pepper,salt and pepper}

{1 lb. linguini,2 Tbsp. oil,3 Tbsp. peanut butter,2 tsp. chili powder,2 tsp. Tabasco sauce,1 1/2 Tbsp. garlic,3 Tbsp. soy sauce,1 Tbsp. oil,2 tsp. fresh ginger,1 tsp. salt,2 tsp. sugar,3 Tbsp. sesame seed}
